import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Message from '../components/Message'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); const placeOrderHandler = () => { console.log('order') } // calculate prices cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty) return ( <>

Shipping

Address {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}{' '}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order summery

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
